original_text: Now the men of Israel had sworn in Mizpeh, saying, There shall not any of us give his daughter unto Benjamin to wife.
korean_text: 이스라엘 사람들이 미스바에서 맹세하여 이르기를 우리 중에 누구든지 딸을 베냐민 사람에게 아내로 주지 아니하리라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Now the men of Israel had sworn in Mizpeh
saying, There shall not any of us
give his daughter unto Benjamin to wife
